channel.title: Rewarding for help with webclients!
channel.description:
Ok well here's the story... I have 2 runescape private servers a 317 (online 24/7) and a 667/704 that im currently developing. So anyway I have never been able to make a webclient with either of these. I get different errors with each one so anyway im just going to stop typing and stuff and say if you are experienced and are willing to make a webclient for me that includes the html applet code i will pay you if necessary...
Problem 317:
Loads fine in jar file and everything but doesn't work when i attempt to put it into a webhost...
problem 667/704:
jar file wont even open when i click...

item.title: Rewarding for help with webclients!
item.dc:creator: @cia_nick cia nick
item.description:
@cia_nick wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:4, topic:438079”]This is the help section, my skype isn’t.
Please post your problems here.[/quote]

Well then… i posted my problems…

item.title: Rewarding for help with webclients!
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Offering for help is not allowed on these forums. Please edit your topic.
We help for free if you at least tell us what exactly is going wrong, what are your errors ect…

Read full topic
